I started on Mastodon when Twitter was bought by Musk.
I'm 75, married to Bill, who is 79 for 57 years this year, have a son and a deceased daughter. I'm anti-royalty and anti-celebrity, anti-capitalist and am a anarcho-syndicalist. I love live music from classical to opera to rock, R&B, pop, jazz, experimental, contemporary etc., reading, growing food and flowers, volunteer and seek a way to live sustainably. No God's, No Masters. Childless Cat Lady
I will vote Green. LONDON, England
